name: 30 days to survive
description: "30 days to survive" - the game is going day, in a world where there is a zombie Apocalypse! The protagonist has to survive 30 days on a randomly generated map full of dead. Long jog in search of useful things and open achievements! Day and night, 11 types of weapons, your own shelter and much more! To sit still in the game don't have to! Can you once again go back on the run to his shelter alive? Wait do you help military rescuers after 30 days? Many different traps, and unpredictable moments awaits you in this low-poly survival game! The choice is yours!
